name: Ascend to Gravity
description:
Reach the top of the tower while the gravity gets stronger and stronger! After all, you are the only one able to fix the gravity generator. But be careful what platform you step on, and keep an eye out for the drones...

Ascend to Gravity is a third person platformer made for the CBT Game Jam.

Controls

W, A, S, D - Move
Mouse - Camera
Escape - Return to Main Menu
